question: Write Question
welcomequestion: Good to see you here! What are you in the mood for today?
joinQuizname: Write the name of the Quiz:
editQuizname: Write the name of the Quiz:
answers: Write answers and mark the correct one
chooseRight: Choose right answers to all question!
typeSomething: Type something in all your questions!
fillCorrect: That the correct answer isn't empty!
whichque: Which questions do you want to include in the quiz?
waitingHost: Waiting for the host to start the quiz...
quizEnded: The quiz has come to an end...
goFaster: We believe in you! Go a bit faster next time!
hostIspreparing: The host is preparing next question...
drop: Släpp frågan för att byta plats på dem!
infoStart: You have three options here Create a new quiz for others to participate in Edit an already existing quiz join someones quiz
infoCreateID: Here you choose an unique name that others will use to play your quiz
infoEditID: Type the name of the quiz you wish to edit
infoPollID: Type the name of the quiz you want to join
infoCreate: Here you create your questions for the quiz You have to mark at least one correct answer by clicking the small box next to the answer boxes.If you want to change the order of the questions you can do so by dragging a question to the desired position When you are happy with  your questions click play quiz!
infoTheme: Here you choose a theme for your quiz You and the ones who play your quiz will see the theme when the quiz is running
infoselectquestions: Here you select which questions you want to include by clicking the small box next to question you exclude the question if you change your mind about the question simply click it again. You also have an option to include a timer This will give the participants a limited time to answer a question
infoChooseName: Write a nickname you wish to compete with The nickname must be unique.
infoWaitingRoom: Before you can start the quiz, by pressing the Lets go button, at least one participant must be logged in Wait until all participants are logged in before you start the quiz.
canjoin: or the Quiz is already running :(
oneQuestion: Please choose at least one question before continuing!
onePlayer: At least one player must join before continuing!
idExists: The Quiz name already exists, please choose another one!
idnotExist: The Quiz namne does not exists
nameExist: Quiz name already exists, please choose another one!
whichque: Time to play! Which questions do you want to include in the Quiz?
